name: C&C 34-2 WK
notes: Listed here as the 34-2 but most often referred to as the 34/36. Launched in the spring of '89, the 34/36 was available in three versions (+, XL and R).The "+" version is the club racer-cruiser. The "R" is the full-blown racing version with a deeper keel. Not long after came the XL version, meant to cover all the bases with "R" performance as well as cruising oriented interior.
